question.title: Is there a way I can use different layout for keycloak's forgot password and updatepassword
question.body:
When we click on 'Forgot Password', an email gets delivered with a reset link. This Reset link redirects to login-update-password.ftl.

The same FTL is called from the account management page when the user attempts to update their password.

I want to have a different layout for both places. To differentiate calls I am using the below code.

<#if (client.baseUrl)?has_content && (client.baseUrl)?ends_with("/account/")>

Account management update password layout

<#elseif>

Forgot password layout

<#/if>

But there is one problem, when user clicks forgot password from account management login screen it sends a reset link to the email. And that link redirects to Account management's update password layout instead of forgot password layout.

Please let me know how to handle this? Hope my query is clear...

answers.body: Your If Condition might be too harsh. tone it down a little and see if that helps. The best option here is to add an accountType tag in the GET request. hope this helps.
